title: Creator Role Schema
description: Standardized enumeration of all possible content creator roles within The Shadow Team Chronicles universe.

descriptions.description: Detailed explanations of each creator role (not part of the enum, provided for documentation)

narrative_designer.description: Responsible for developing story arcs, plot structures, and narrative flow within the world.

world_builder.description: Focuses on creating settings, locations, cultures, technologies, and the larger fictional universe.

character_designer.description: Specializes in creating, developing, and defining characters, their personalities, backgrounds, and relationships.

editor.description: Refines, polishes, and ensures consistency in created content, potentially making revisions and adjustments.

ai_assistant.description: AI tool or system that helped generate or refine content through various prompting techniques.

gm.description: Game Master who runs and oversees tabletop roleplaying game sessions set in the universe.

player.description: Participant in tabletop roleplaying games who contributes character actions and decisions.

lore_keeper.description: Maintains continuity and chronicles the comprehensive background history, legends, and accumulated knowledge of the world.

scene_writer.description: Creates specific narrative scenes, dialogues, and moment-to-moment story beats.

illustrator.description: Produces visual artwork, concept designs, or illustrations related to the narrative content.

game_designer.description: Develops game mechanics, systems, and playable scenarios set in the universe.

translator.description: Converts content between languages while preserving narrative intent and meaning.

content_reviewer.description: Evaluates existing content for quality, consistency, and alignment with established canon.

consultant.description: Provides specialized knowledge or expertise in specific domains relevant to the content.

developer.description: Works on technical implementations, tools, or systems that support the narrative content.

archivist.description: Organizes, catalogs, and maintains the database of narrative content and related materials.

researcher.description: Conducts historical, scientific, or cultural research to inform and enhance the authenticity of narrative elements.
